comment: Professor Gillis was awesome! She was a real sweet lady that really cares about what she teaches. This class was super easy online and very organized. It was easy to understand the expectations of each assignment. I definitely recommend!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Nancy is honestly probably the best profesor I have ever had. I took her for my first education class and she is amazing. She is so sweet and caring and makes sure that class is not just a boring lecture class. There is a lot of little activities that some count as classwork grades, but they are very easy and are just for participation. Great class
super super nice and enthusiastic. easy A

Mrs. Gillis is the nicest lady you will ever meet. She is so passionate about education and really cares about each and every one of her students. If I could take her for every class, I would! You will not hear a single bad word said about her. She will make you excited to learn! You need her in your life!
